goal.en: Understanding of basic physical phenomena at solid surfaces and their applications
goal.ch: 習知固體表面的物理現象及其應用

content.ch:
“表面科學概述、
表面分析技術、
表面熱動力學、
表面化學分析、
表面晶格結構、
表面電子結構、
表面光學性質、
表面相變。“

textbook.en: “References (if not textbooks) 1.“Physics at Surfaces” by Andrew Zangwill, Cambridge University Press. 2.“Modern Techniques of Surface Science (2nd ed.) by D.P. Woodruff ＆ T.A. Delchar, Cambridge University Press.“
textbook.ch: “參考書 1.“Physics at Surfaces” by Andrew Zangwill, Cambridge University Press. 2.“Modern Techniques of Surface Science (2nd ed.) by D.P. Woodruff ＆ T.A. Delchar, Cambridge University Press.“

grading.en: “Questions ＆ answers 15％ Homework 20％ Midterm exam 30％ Final report (oral + written) 35％“
grading.ch: “平時 15％ 作業 20％ 期中考 30％ 期末報告 35％“
